value.string: RPA009 Monthly FHCF Loss Summary - Email not found (< 10 Days)
If a duplicate is found, the bot cleans up any files, sends a notification without processing, and prepares to shut down.

value.expression:
Hello, 

Error: Mailbox has more than one unread email

The Monthly FHCF Loss Summary (RPA009) bot did not complete successfully due to the mailbox more than one unread email with the correct subject.

Please confirm which email is the correct one to process and let RPA Support know which one to mark again as unread in order to rerun the process.

Date and Time: $m-date-string$
Username: $System:AATaskInvoker{"Invoker_UserName"}$
